managers

Class DatabaseMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.DatabaseMan

  • public class DatabaseMan
extends java.lang.Object
    DataBaseManager is a class with predefined credentials for the database. It also provides query methods which can be used to query directly to the database. All query's are with prepared statements.

      • queryManipulation

        public void queryManipulation(java.lang.String query,
                     java.lang.String[] values,
                     java.lang.String[] types)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Prepared statement insert query, insert queries ONLY!!
        Parameters:
        query - String with ? for the valuess
        values - the values to be inserted
        types - the value types, supported: String, Int
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
